Text: INTERNATIONAL TREASURY MANAGEMENTpst Dear Rick Buy INTERNATIONAL TREASURY MANAGEMENT Tuesday Thursday March Westin Stamford Hotel Stamford CT The early registration deadline is fast approaching book today and save up to This is the only international treasury event in the US for senior treasury professionals and is your opportunity to join the leaders in cash management from the companies making a difference PROGRAM HIGHLIGHTS Determine the most appropriate strategy and structure for your international operations Examine the treasurys role in managing risk exposure on an enterprisewide basis Review effective working capital management on a global scale Discover methodologies for better evaluation of corporate investments Learn how to use earningsatrisk methodologies to aggregate risk Implement a supply chain financing program to improve relationships on the buy and sellside Plus Running concurrently on Thursday March th will be a special one day conference devoted to Treasury Management in Emerging Markets the only conference of its kind running in the US this year Reexamine your strategy in these regions and to learn how US corporations can survive and thrive For full program details and to register please visit our website wwweurofinancecouk Alternatively please contact Kendra Bahneman on or email In order to qualify for the early registration rate you must book before February I look forward to welcoming you to Stamford this March Caroline Bond Managing Director
